snippet: Eight Los Angeles police officers violated Police Department policy when they fired on two unarmed women in a pickup truck during the hunt for a former Los Angeles police officer.
abstract: Civilian oversight board says eight Los Angeles police officers violated Police Department policy when they fired on two unarmed women in pickup truck during hunt for former Los Angeles police officer Christopher Dorner.
lead_paragraph: Eight Los Angeles police officers violated Police Department policy when they fired on two unarmed women in a pickup truck during the hunt for a former Los Angeles police officer.

headline.main: California: Officers Faulted in Mistaken Shooting
headline.print_headline: California: Officers Faulted in Mistaken Shooting
